personal-details.intro: You must enter these details exactly as they appear on your eVisa so we can review the problem.

contact.header: How should we contact you about your eVisa?

someone-else-details.intro: We will attempt to contact the requestor directly. We will only use these details to contact you if needed.
someone-else-details.consent: By continuing, you confirm that you have consent to send this request on their behalf.

check-answers.header: Check your answers before sending your request

send-request.disclaimer: By sending your request you are confirming that, to the best of your knowledge, the details you are providing are correct.
send-request.link-text: how the Home Office uses your personal information

completing-for-someone-else.header: Details of person completing this form on behalf of another

completing-for-someone-else.label: Are you completing this form on behalf of someone else?

accessibility.header: Accessibility statement for Error correction service form
